ygData.subject: Re: Brewing
ygData.msgSnippet: Wah seh....10 pp in 10 mins??????? Ok..that s it...when i lvl 12 tonite...me gonna brew until next morning! heehhehehehe I gotta spend around at least 40 pp or
ygData.messageBody:
Wah seh....10 pp in 10 mins???????
Ok..that's it...when i lvl 12 tonite...me gonna brew until next morning!
heehhehehehe
I gotta spend around at least 40 pp or more on spells alone (not getting
them all even) so i better start brewing!

p.s Entreri they still lookin for Superman actor...since you so fast...maybe
you can beat Nicholas Cage
and get the role.. LOL
uh..and what's your EQ nick again? me will see if ya online next time...want
to add more to my friend's list
leh..now only got ziltus who's from sg

Zanderion (brewing once i reach lvl 12 magi)
